st:Description.name: CGRFormat
st:Description.st:detailedRole: These settings handles the parameters that provides the ability to customize the output of the CGR format

st:attribute.Name: V4_Model_CommentPage
st:attribute.st:role: Enables/disables the V4_Model_CommentPage CGR applicative container
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows to save comment page in the cache CGR file

st:attribute.Name: V4_Model_LnF
st:attribute.st:role: Enables/disables the V4_Model_LnF CGR applicative container
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows to save V4 Layers and Filters in the cache CGR file

st:attribute.Name: V5_SPA
st:attribute.st:role: Enables/disables the V5_SPA CGR applicative container
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows to save space analysis data in the cache CGR file

st:attribute.Name: V4V5_FDT
st:attribute.st:role: Enables/disables the V4V5_FDT CGR applicative container
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows to save FDT data in the cache CGR file

st:attribute.Name: Voxels
st:attribute.st:role: Enables/disables the Voxels CGR applicative container
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows to save the voxelized form of the geometry in the cache CGR file

st:attribute.Name: LightSceneGraph
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Opens CGR files in light scene graph mode (lower memory consumption)

st:attribute.Name: VoxelsAccuracy
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the accuracy of the voxelization generated in the CGR file in mm.
